name: Binary Fixer
description:
Binary Fixer

Seems that the binary code is broken...

Fix it destroing the "2" 

 

when it is in the indicator!! But be careful and don't destroy the other numbers!! You will have 5 attempts and then, you will lose the game, good luck!

  • CONTROLS:
Destroy NumberPause/UnPause GameLEFT MOUSE BUTTONESCAPE Key (sometimes you need to press it more than once)DELETE KeyPause/Resume Button TOUCH (only on the right side of the screen)
